divs: sighting detailsas i was leaving landrum,still in city limits travelling north. was observing deep blue sky .saw sphere object 3\4 size of full moon come from behind cumulus cloud aprox.5 mi away,i can be fairly sure because i know the mtns well. object apeared to have a dull matt alluminum surface. observed for about 8 sec. had to pay att. to traffic object was moving 3 to 4 hundred mph.my estimate. faster than small fixed wing a\c but slower than jet a\c. took so long to report as i am 71 yrs old and have looked for 30 yrs to see something. my feelings ill b damed finally.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Landrum
There were no other sightings in Landrum on or around August 1st 2011
Summary: driving north, leaving landrum sc. observed sphere come from behind cloud
